field.label: Customer Alias Management
field.comment: You can allow the customers to manage/delete their aliases in the their account.

field.label: Await Notification
field.comment: In some cases it may take a few seconds until the transaction is successfully authorized. When this option is enabled, the notification is awaited.

field.label: External Checkout: Guest Checkout
field.comment: When using an external checkout, the customer can either be asked to chose an option to authenticate (as guest, register or login) or he can always be checked out as guest. For the second option to work, guest checkout has to be enabled in magento.

field.label: Operation Mode
field.comment: You can switch between the different environments, by selecting the corresponding operation mode.

field.label: Store ID
field.comment: The Store ID will be provided by FirstData Connect and usally consist of 11 digits.

field.label: Shared Secret Connect Interface provided by FirstData Connect.
field.comment: The shared secret for the connect interface

field.label: Order prefix
field.comment: Here you can insert an order prefix. The prefix allows you to change the order number that is transmitted to FirstData Connect . The prefix must contain the tag {id}. It will then be replaced by the order number (e.g. name-{id}). Make sure that you do not use '_'.

field.label: 3d Secure Result
field.comment: During the authorization of the payment a 3D secure check may be done. The selected outcomes are treated as uncertain transactions.

field.label: Force non SSL notifications
field.comment: Force FirstData Connect to send the payment notification on a non SSL secured connection

field.label: PaymentPage Mobile Detection
field.comment: With this setting you can control how mobile devices shoulg be treated. If you use select 'Detect Mobile' the mobile optimized payment page is used, if the user is on a mobile device and the responsive otherwise. With the 'Responsive' option the responsive payment page is used for all users.

field.label: Store ID (Test)
field.comment: The Store ID will be provided by FirstData Connect and usally consist of 11 digits. (Test)

field.label: Shared Secret Connect Interface provided by FirstData Connect (Test).
field.comment: The shared secret for the connect interface (Test)

field.label: Level
field.comment: Messages of this or a higher level will be logged.

field.label: Show Payment Id
field.comment: Show the payment id in the order information

field.label: Use Base Currency
field.comment: Send amounts to FirstData Connect in store's base currency.

field.label: Invoice Settlement
field.comment: Choose settlement after order in case you want an invoice to be created with your oder. The state of the invoice will set according to your capture status. For captured payments, an invoice is always created.

field.label: Send Invoice Email
field.comment: Send the invoice email automatically after invoice creation.

field.label: Capturing
field.comment: Should the amount be captured automatically after the order (direct) or should the amount only be reserved (deferred)?

field.label: Solvency Information
field.comment: Gather solvency information through the service from Bürgel

field.label: 3d Secure Active
field.comment: Disable 3d Secure for this payment method.

field.label: Authorization Method
field.comment: Select the authorization method to use for processing this payment method.

field.label: Show Payment Id
field.comment: Show the payment id in the order information

field.label: Use Base Currency
field.comment: Send amounts to FirstData Connect in store's base currency.

field.label: Invoice Settlement
field.comment: Choose settlement after order in case you want an invoice to be created with your oder. The state of the invoice will set according to your capture status. For captured payments, an invoice is always created.

field.label: Send Invoice Email
field.comment: Send the invoice email automatically after invoice creation.

field.label: Credit Card Brands
field.comment: The brand of the credit card is detected by the card number if hidden authorization is used. The allowed credit card brands can be restricted by this setting. If payment page is used the customer will select the payment method at ____paymetnServiceProviderName____ and this setting is ignored.

field.label: Image Brand Selection
field.comment: The card brand selection is automatically done depending on the entered card number. If no Javascript is active in the browser, a drop down is shown. In case JavaScript a the brand logos can be shown. Should the brand selection using images? (Only for Hidden Authorization)

field.label: Capturing
field.comment: Should the amount be captured automatically after the order (direct) or should the amount only be reserved (deferred)?

field.label: Solvency Information
field.comment: Gather solvency information through the service from Bürgel

field.label: 3d Secure Active
field.comment: Disable 3d Secure for this payment method.

field.label: Authorization Method
field.comment: Select the authorization method to use for processing this payment method.

field.label: Alias Manager
field.comment: The alias manager allows the customer to select from a credit card previously stored. The sensitive data is stored by FirstData Connect.

field.comment: Show the payment id in the order information
